title: S13 Ep54: Hunting in the Haunted Heart of America
itunes:title: Hunting in the Haunted Heart of America
description:
Logan Corelli has over seventeen years of experience investigating haunted locations across America. He joins Beyond The Darkness to talk about his paranormal beginnings, and well known investigations of places like the Villisca Axe House, Myrtles Plantation, as well as some of his more unusual hauntings, all while providing tantalizing evidence that he believes the paranormal exists!

Get the book here : www.Amazon.com/shop/darknessradio
